reviews.review:
第一人称太晕了玩不下去，但又错过了退款时间退不了款。我是傻逼。
当然游戏是好游戏，请各位量力而行。

故事据说不错，但叙事节奏异常蛋疼，剧情推进非常缓慢，基本就是干什么事都有一堆人打我，必须开枪杀掉一堆人，然后走两步，半分钟剧情，继续杀一堆人。。如果不是FPS爱好者会很难受，我玩这个就冲着剧情和画面来的，结果剧情只占游玩时间的1/20不到。另外一点就是空轨的设计，确实看起来很酷炫，到处飞，玩起来晕的一笔。。。

游戏时间８小时，至少７小时在打枪杀人，甚至我都没搞懂我为什么要杀这些人（因为他们要杀我，这又为什么？）。无法实时存档，必须到存档点自动存（可能半小时才有一个）。剧情给我的感受就是，[spoiler]　男主到了哥伦比亚，要找伊丽莎白，被发现了，开始大杀特杀。杀了一堆人总算找到伊丽莎白，准备跑路，需要飞艇，为了从叛军那里搞到飞艇，答应帮叛军的忙，给他们提供武器。又杀了一堆人，加上伊丽莎白的特异功能，在不同的时空里穿梭，终于到了某个时空，叛军获得了武器，和主角一起杀了一堆士兵。最后男主去要报酬，叛军首领翻脸不认人，又要杀出一条血路？？？　[/spoiler]实在是折磨，不打算玩了，留个评价，希望想入的小伙伴慎重。如果喜欢FPS可以放心买，否则不如云一下。。。

同样作为射击游戏，《天外世界》我就能玩进去，大概三四十小时通关吧。因为《天外世界》是纯正的美式RPG，打枪只是战斗手段，有丰富的剧情，鲜活的NPC，多方派系可以做出选择，有非常多打枪以外的乐趣。而《生化奇兵：无限》我觉得只能归为纯FPS游戏。

ES : Recomendarlo?,Es todo lo que esta bien en un juego...Pero recomiendo que compren el Collection de BioShock!,Y empezar desde el 1,Porque ahi arranca la historia y no para hasta los dlc de esta tercer entrega,Una historia impresionante...!,Como un rompecabezas...Que a medida que jugas vas a ir uniendo y entendiendo cada parte de esas piezas!,Al principio capas no entiendas nada,Pero una ves que empezas!,Te atrapa y te da ese ímpetu,De investigar cada cosa,Que rol cumple,Que ultimamente esto,En este juego,Es lo recomendable,Jugarlo tranquilo,Explorar hasta el ultimo rincón de cada lugar,Y apreciar su ambientacion visual tan hermosa y unica,Plagada de suspenso,Adrenalina y miedo!,Sus relatos...Desde BioShock 1!

Sin mas que decir,Infaltable la coleccion de BioShock en la biblioteca de Steam!,Un juego que fue y sera un clasico...(Se sueña con una cuarta entrega?,si!,Ambientada en Rapture...Antes de la guerra civil,Ver esa hermosa ciudad submarina,En tiempos de "paz",En un modo de ver,Como civilmente era!)

EN : Recommend it?, It is everything that is good in a game ... But I recommend that you buy the BioShock Collection!, And start from the 1st, because that's where the story starts and does not stop until the dlc of this third installment, An impressive story ...!, Like a puzzle ... That as you play you are going to join and understand each part of those pieces! At the beginning layers you do not understand anything, But once you start!, It catches you and gives you that impetus , To investigate each thing, What role does this play, What lately this, In this game, It is recommended, Play it quietly, Explore every corner of each place, And appreciate its visual setting so beautiful and unique, Full of suspense, Adrenaline and fear !, His stories ... From BioShock 1!

Without more to say, the BioShock collection in the Steam library is indispensable!, A game that was and will be a classic ... (Do you dream of a fourth installment? Yes!, Set in Rapture ... Before the war civil, See that beautiful underwater city, In times of "peace", In a way of seeing, As civilly it was!)

Bioshock Infinity oynadigim en gozel hekayesi olan oyunlardan biridir. Eger oynadiqdan sonra helede hekayeni anlamamisinizsa bir daha oynamalisiniz. Oyunun hekayesi qarisiq oldugundan biraz anlamaq cetinlesir. Oyunun  hekayesine filmlerden numune kimi gostersek Interstellar filmini deye bilerik. Filmin hekayesi eynile Bioshock Infinitynin hekayesi ile eyni olmasada 70 % oxsarliq var. Eger Interstellar filmini izlemisinizse ve de Bioshock Infinity oyununun hekayesini anlamisinizsa onda ne demek istediyimi anlayacaqsiniz.

Deeply, profoundly flawed but also kind of magnificent. Yes the gameplay has been dumbed down from Bioshock 1 and 2 into a corridor shooter (which is fine with me because I'm too stupid for Immersive Sims but YMMV) and yes, Levine's insistence that there's no difference between a white supremacist zealot and the leader of a communist resistance group is the kind of insanity that you'd expect Andrew Ryan to be bellowing at you from one of The Rapture's rusty speakers.

BUT I can deal with all that because Columbia is one of the most astonishing game worlds ever realized. It's so gorgeous and full of attention to detail that it became a much needed bit of digital tourism for me as Ireland goes through yet another lockdown. So much thought has been put into the history of Columbia and the forces that brought it into being. People say there's no environmental storytelling in this and sure, there's not really anything like OG Bioshock where you find a badly tortured corpse and an accompanying audio log. But the environments are CONSTANTLY telling the story of Columbia through its stores, its culture, its architecture. They're so packed to the rafters with information that I prolly added the better part of 4 hours to my playthru because I stopped progressing so many times just to admire the areas I found myself on.  

For all Infinite's many failures, it's one of the few games that truly felt like it brought me to another world (even if it's largely a horrible one), and at a time where I'm going to lose my f*ck*ng sh*t if I have to spend another day in my apartment, that is something to be dearly treasured.

[h1] [b] BioShock Infinite [/b] [/h1]

The third entry into the titular BioShock series. Only this time, instead of a story set within the city of Rapture, leagues below under the sea, you venture to Columbia a "haven for man" in the sky. You will fight through this city in the sky to retrieve Elizabeth, the girl you've been hired to retrieve to wipe your debts. So, is this new entry worth our time? Lets get into it.

[h1] [b] The Good [/b] [/h1]

[*] [b] The Graphics [/b] 

- By far, this is not the most important point I have to make, but geez! I had come to love the scenic views and unique setting that Bioshock had created for us within Rapture, so obviously I thought they could never one-up that, right? Wrong! I can legitimately say that I spent the first 15 to 20 playable minutes just walking around with my jaw dropped looking at literally anything. From the beautiful view from atop the clouds, to the half-eaten apple in the garbage bin, it just looks astonishing. 

[*] [b] The Story [/b] 

- What would a BioShock game be without a great story? Well, not a BioShock I suppose. Anyway, Infinite continues the BioShock legend of having absolutely fun, intriguing, and at times mind-boggling stories and sub-plots. The perfect mix of "Oh geez" to "I'm tearing up a bit " to "What the **** is going on?".

[*] [b] The Combat [/b]

- Lets be honest, the earlier BioShocks didn't exactly have the most groundbreaking combat, that's just how it was. However, Infinite makes tearing your enemies apart just infinitely better! (please laugh). Nah, but for real, amazing new weapons built off of the established mechanics of the first two BioShocks mixed with brand new mechanics such as aerial combat, improved melee, and new plasmids makes for one heck of a fight

[*] [b] The Characters [/b]

- Another new area, at least for me, in a BioShock game. Before, the protagonists and main characters were always entertaining and well written, but they had never had the depth shown to us here. In Infinite I found myself getting attached to characters for the first time in any BioShock game. Especially towards the end of the game, you start to see something from a new perspective, and it really adds a lot of depth and additional thought to a certain character

[h1] [b] The Bad [/b] [/h1]
 
[*] [b] The Length [/b]

- Yeah, yeah, I know. Shut up. Infinite was really short! The story is finished in just about 10 hours. Now don't get me wrong, there's no issue with a short game that has a perfect story, but Infinite starts to rush it all at about the 6-7 hour mark. It goes from a slow burn introduction to the most random **** and then tries to cram what should of been another 10 hours of gameplay and story into an under 10 hour story. Just came off as a little rushed, and I felt it. 

[h1] [b] The Ugly [/b] [/h1]

[*] [b] The Crashes and Freezes [/b]

- The One bane of existence every BioShock seems to have. They have a tendency to crash or freeze. This issue started with BioShock, continued into BioShock 2, and is still present in Infinite today. I will give the developers points however, because they've improved the autosave tremendously. At least your crash won't make me lose 6 hours of gameplay

[h1] [b] Overall [/b] [/h1] 

BioShock Infinite is an amazing example of a game that attempts to break the boundaries it has set for its self, and actually succeeds in doing so. It completely revolutionizes the BioShock franchise and opens up a whole new perspective onto a series we all thought we knew. I cannot simply recommend this game enought
tremendo bucle

O terceiro jogo da saga BioShock é simplesmente perfeito, saindo da Boa e Velha ''Rapture'' (Cidade no fundo do mar), desta vez se passa em Columbia, a gameplay ficou mais ágil e com gráficos mais lindos ainda,  trilha sonora perfeita como sempre (dessa vez com vibe de 1912), ocorrem grandes mudanças em relações aos dois primeiros games a falta dos ''Big Daddys'' e ''Litle Sisters'' são algumas delas...

 bom, não vou me prolongar mais nesta  análise, o jogo é simplesmente perfeito com uma história que, Meu Deus, daria um livro de 500 páginas, simplesmente incrível.

NOTA 10/10

A convoluted mess of a game with plot holes the size of the director's ego. If you're a fan of leftie cringe-fest stories that boil down to whites are all evil, Christians bad than this is your game. If you want something well written and engaging just play the first two entries in the series instead.

Replaying this game made me confused about all the hype. The game's fun, the setting is super cool, but for the time it came out, it's super lacking.

Minor -'s

I'm sorry but Elizabeth's voice actress is awful, and I cannot stand her.
With the choices you get, they don't matter (I get that it's about constants and variables, but it doesn't pull it off IMO)
Troy Baker is as good as usual, but he always just sounds like Troy Baker and not his role
Replaying the game shows its flaws
The story is so self-absorbed at some moments

+'s
Enemy variation and combat is fun
The time travel aspect and tears are cool
Comstock is an interesting character

When I reviewed Bioshock 2 I said that it was a paradox: While upgrading every aspect of the first game it felt inferior. Bioshock Infinite is the exact opposite: While there are many flaws within this game, it remains to this day one of the best games ever made. 

Yes, Bioshock infinite has a lot of problems. It has an abundance of guns, but you can carry only two at a time. The iron sights that feel useless. The upgrade system of your weapons, The lack of a map. The bad design of the voxophones that lack subs and that they fade when new dialog is introduced. The hard railroading that doesn't let you explore at your will. The rail system that is more confusing than interesting. Problems that were solved in the second game return. The criminally bad auto-save system (why would you omit a manual save that was part of the last two games?). The stories that feel half-finished like the Vox Populi that is half of what Fontaine used to be. The lack of philosophy, that now turns into a political commentary (American Exceptionalism Vs. Socialism)

But despite all these faults, Bioshock Infinite excels in delivering a very unique story, with two very likeable (and meme-able) characters, some great plot-twists. You assume the role of Booker Catch Dewitt who is tasked with bringing a girl in order to repay his debts. The story goes deeper and deeper as you try to solve the mysteries of Elizabeth's past as well as your own. Also, I have only love for the Luteces.

Visually is stunning, not because of the raw graphic power, but because of the artistic vision of the game, the light of Columbia, the distinct districts, the city that feels alive - a huge contrast to the graveyard of madness that was Rapture. The levels of immersion are beyond compare and to build something like that takes a lot of passion and a lot of talent. 

Bottom Line: People believe that a classic game, a game that will go down in history must be a perfect game. Bioshock Infinite teaches otherwise. It doesn't have to be perfect in every aspect, it doesn't have to be the perfect gameplay or the photorealistic graphics to be a game to remember. All it takes is a clever story, a clear vision and a team that shares the talent and the passion for game making.

玩你妈，天天打不开，就在这尬吹吧

EMPANADAS DE CARNE
Ingredientes
500 gramos de carne de vaca picada
1/2 kilogramo cebolla picada
2 cebollas verdeo picadas
1 diente ajo picado
2 huevos duros picados
3 cucharadas almidón de maíz Maizena
1 lata de tomate
aceite cantidad necesaria
ají molido seco cantidad necesaria
orégano seco cantidad necesaria
comino en polvo cantidad necesaria
pimentón en polvo cantidad necesaria
12 tapas para empanadas
1 huevo para pintar
Instrucciones
1_En una cacerola saltear la cebolla, la cebolla de verdeo y el ajo.

2_Una vez que las verduras estén bien cocidas agregar la carne picada junto al tomate en conserva (lata). Cocinar por 10 minutos aprox.

3_Agregar la Maizena® disuelta en el agua fría y cocinar por 1 minuto más. Condimentar con las especias y el huevo duro. Reservar y enfriar.

4_Armar las empanadas, repulgar y pintar con el huevo batido.

5_Cocinar en horno a 200°C hasta que resulten bien doradas.

En comparación a las dos entregas anteriores hay un cambio muy drástico de todo, armas, poderes, gráficos que jugando en 2021 se veía hermoso, muy buena historia, enemigos variados pero reciclaron mucho y lindas  mecánicas. Los DLC están buenos pero abusaron mucho de ir a x zona matar a enemigos para después volver y que aparezcan más, me gustaron las nuevas armas que incluyeron y los nuevos poderes, la historia me gusto porque le da un buen cierre a la trama.
Только из-за одной концовки можно пройти это ЧУДО игровой индустрии.

Игра отличная жаль что субтитры, ну я умный и поставил русскую озвучку топ игра!

Gameplay más que divertido, historia excelente. Un punto negativo, es que ahora tenemos solo 2 armas activas para usar, al igual que 2 plasmidos, cuando en los anteriores juegos nos tenian acostumbrados a poder usar todos. Los "Plasmidos" (llamados ahora vigorizadores) son mucho más vistosos y poderosos. Nuevas mecánicas (al fin se puede correr xd) y otras iguales pero de distintas formas llevadas a cabo. El problema es que si este juego tuviese otro titulo seria lo mismo, no siento que mantenga la esencia de los anteriores bioshock, y eso lo digo después de jugarlos de seguido antes de jugar este. De todas formas, es un juego excelente, solo que no lo consideraria un bioshock como tal.

[b] Букер, ты веришь в Бога? [/b]

Из плюсов:
[list]
    [*] Сюжет. Мне понравилась не сама сюжетная линия Букера, а изменения Элизабет, и ее путь становления как личности.
    [*] Боёвка. Динамичная и веселая. Правда стрельба все же не вызывает восторга.
    [*] Графика. Конечно спустя 8 лет графика в игре не вызывает должного эффекта, хотя и на выходе не вызывала, но тщательная проработка каждой локации и видов в целом заставляла останавливаться и разглядывать мир вокруг главного героя
[/list]

Из минусов:
[list]
    [*]Пару раз было неприятно растянута игра. Вот главный герой приходит в конец локации нужен предмет находящийся в ответвлении в начале локации, бежишь за этим предметом по пустой локации, а потом назад получив предмет. Встречалось такое всего 2-3 раза, но все равно осадок остался.
    [*]В некоторых моментах мне были не ясны действия главного героя, а конкретно почему он делает то или иное действие. В первой части все списывалось на сюжетный ход, а тут.... просто потому что так надо.
[/list]

BioShock INFINITE - третья игра в серии «BioShock». 
Немного перемотав назад просто вспомним что первые две части были просто потрясающие. 
Эта игра не стала исключением. Игра выросла в плане сюжета. В плане геймплея я честно – особо не заметил, ибо те же самые перестрелки из обычного оружия + использование плазмидов, но это всё по-прежнему интересно. Ибо появились новые плазмиды и новое оружие.
Так же игра выросла по уровню графики причём колоссально, но это не удивительно ведь разница между первой частью и этой – 6 лет. А между этой и второй частью – 3 года.
Помню в год выхода игры все, кому не лень косплеили Элизабет, было кучу постов с ней, и теперь я действительно понимаю почему. Данный персонаж затмевает абсолютно каждого персонажа в этой игре. Элизабет очень милая, привлекательная и интересная девушка со своей историей. Я бы даже сказал, что она как вишенка на торте для этой игры во круг которой и вертится весь сюжет.

Видимо разработчики просекли фишку что игр с обычными наземными городами это уже не впечатляет, поэтому первые две части были под водой в «Восторге», а тут действия происходят в городе «Колумбия» который находится высоко в небе. Летающий город проще говоря. 

Вообще по атмосфере если честно, первые две части меня зацепили сильнее. Безусловно и тут всё как надо, и на дворе 2021 год, а я всё ещё ожидаю 4 часть игры, хоть в «Восторге», хоть в «Колумбии», хоть где вообще. Но всё же атмосферно первые две части лучше для меня, хотя я и поставлю данной серии игры 9.0 баллов из 10. Опять же спойлеры кидать не буду, просто порекомендую пройти эту чудесную игру, НО также обязательно рекомендую к прохождению и предыдущие две части, ибо Bioshok это игра феномен. Начавшая выходить в 2007 году, по уровню графики, звука, геймплея и сюжета она обогнала все игры что выходили в те же года. И обогнала она настолько что в 2021 году играя в неё – глаз радуется картинке. Особенно рекомендую тем, у кого железо не тянет современные игры, то все три части Bioshok обязательны к прохождению.
Juegazo! Bastante fácil aún en díficil pero una historia y una jugabilidad geniales.
